data.content:
adjective
always used before a noun
medical :happening after death
a postmortem examination
noun
plural -tems
[count] medical :an examination of a dead body to find out the cause of death :autopsy
A postmortem showed that the man had been poisoned.
a discussion or analysis of something (such as an event) after it has ended
Party leaders are conducting a postmortem of the election to try to find out what went wrong.
